snippet: Charlie Beljan had trouble breathing before he teed off at the Disney PGA Tour event, but shot an eight-under-par 64 for a three-shot lead.
abstract: Charlie Beljan takes second-round lead at Disney PGA Tour event, but is hospitalized afterward for breathing problems; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Charlie Beljan had trouble breathing before he teed off at the Disney PGA Tour event, but shot an eight-under-par 64 for a three-shot lead.

headline.seo: Charlie Beljan Taken to Hospital After Gaining Lead in Disney PGA Tour Event
headline.main: Disney PGA Tour Event Leader Hospitalized
